mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_answer (id, qId, userId, answer) VALUES (#{id}, #{qId}, #{userId}, #{answer})
mapper.select: SELECT t_answer.id AS answerId, t_answer.qId, t_answer.userId, t_user.name AS userName, t_answer.answer FROM t_answer JOIN t_user ON t_user.userId = t_answer.userId WHERE t_answer.userId = #{userId} AND t_answer.qId = #{qId};
